hcc_text: Amboy Road is a pedestrian high crash corridor (top third for pedestrian deaths and serious injuries per mile in Staten Island)
info: At Amboy Road at St. Alban's Place, Putnam Street and Ridgecrest Avenue, there were 16 injuries in crashes between 2008 and 2012.
intersection: Amboy Road at St. Alban's Place, Putnam Street and Ridgecrest Avenue
